name: SUCPOP
description:
SUCPOP was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam over the course of about 28 hours. In the game, players control two orbs that can be "joined together" into a single orb. This new orb has different properties and can interact with other obstacles in the game. 

Controls:

A - D: Move the left orb left and right

Left Arrow - Right Arrow: move the right orb left and right

Mechanics:

Merging: Continuously move the two orbs into each other and they will be sucked together. The two orbs still retain their original movement so make sure to continue moving with both, their added velocity is higher together!

Credits:

I used two fonts:

https://www.dafont.com/super-chunk.font

https://www.dafont.com/roller.font

I also used DoTween and TextMeshPro in Unity.

I did all the programming, art, and design.
